page.title: 20The School Fete
page.content: One day I like most after Christmas and my birthday is the day we have our school fete which is usually held in July.It really is a smashing day.Every body is rushing around getting the things ready for putting in the competitions of which there are many such as cakes,bread,eggs,flowers ,and vegetables.We also enter a drawing competition from each of our classes. I am hoping the sun soon starts shining so it will help my plants and seeds to grow.Then I can have a stall of my own on the day.Mum has said she will make me some small jars of home made jam to put on my stall.We all have a lovely time going around all the other stalls and shows.At the end we are all very tired. by Alan Dewing Age 9
